verbs.description: Trump [V: has] repeatedly sought to shift blame towards Congress and Democrats , repeatedly tweeting " CHANGE THE LAWS " . However , it is his administration that chooses how to enforce the laws .

[ARG0: Trump] has [ARGM-MNR: repeatedly] [V: sought] [ARG1: to shift blame towards Congress and Democrats] , [ARGM-ADV: repeatedly tweeting " CHANGE THE LAWS "] . However , it is his administration that chooses how to enforce the laws .
